law.text: All appropriations from fiscal courts shall be used in the payment of salaries and expenses of duly appointed extension service employees of the College of Agriculture and Home Economics of the University of Kentucky, serving in the county making the appropriation, or to pay for supplies or equipment for these employees.
law.history: Amended 1956 Ky. Acts ch. 51, sec. 4, effective May 18, 1956. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 42d-11.
